messages.title: THEIR EXTREME BREXIT WILL WRECK BRITAIN...
ONLY THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS CAN STOP EXTREME BREXIT WRECKING OUR COUNTRY.
The Liberal Democrats are fighting for a brighter future for Britain...
messages.content: ...if you want to stop an extreme Brexit join millions like you who are voting Lib Dem this time.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop extreme Brexit which is supported by Labour.

endorsements.endorsement: Jeremy Corbyn has betrayed us over Brexit. He is unfit to be called leader of the opposition.

quotes.text: "Jeremy Corbyn has betrayed us over Brexit. He is unfit to be called leader of the opposition."
"Jeremy Corbyn throws in the towel and confirms Brexit. He has aligned the Labour Party with UKIP?"
“The Lib Dems... have vowed to fight us every step of the way.”

images.caption: Liberal Democrats party supporters and activists.
